data.eml:eml: Diversity of the genus Terebellides (Polychaeta: Trichobranchidae) in the Adriatic Sea with the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Parapar, Julio, Mikac, Barbara, Fiege, Dieter (2013): Diversity of the genus Terebellides (Polychaeta: Trichobranchidae) in the Adriatic Sea with the description of a new species. Zootaxa 3691 (3): 333-350, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.3.3
